name: UFO Clicker
description:
Use the arrow keys to navigate and the left mouse button to fire. You don't need to dodge the missiles, you have a shield. Scrap material is only earned if the missile is destroyed by a laser. Saving is buggy.

Winner of the:

February 2016
Game Developers League
Game Jam
http://gamedevleague.com/game-jam/

Themes:

  1. You are the enemy: You're an invading UFO
  2. Incremental: Buy upgrades indefinitely
  3. Bullet-hell: Dodge missiles (when possible)

Unfortunately, there was little balancing.

The sounds used in this game are from:

https://www.freesound.org/people/IanM32/sounds/210...

Music by, Joergi:

http://sampleswap.org/mp3/song.php?id=516

The models were created by myself in Qubicle

http://www.minddesk.com/

Thanks!

Press L for the debug menu.
